Job Description: Job Summary     Answers inbound calls within guidelinesgoals established by the client and management. Consistently achieves call quality score goals in order to meet client and customer satisfaction goals.      Primary Job Responsibilities       International Customer Service Support Voice       Responsibility: Provide Customer Support to USUK Customers    Education Qualification: Any UndergraduateGraduate Fresher can Apply(Anyone pursuing regular education would not be eligible to apply for this job)    Shift Timings: Should be flexible to work in Rotational Shifts    Desired Skills: Need Excellent Communication skills in English.
